Hi!
   I was wondering if anyone knew where I could find Japanese 
history books in Chinese.  I am especially looking for a good 
history of the samurai, as well as versions of "The 47 Ronin", "The 
Tale of Genji" and books on Musashi Miyamoto.  I would also be 
interested in any books on Japanese folk tales (onis, kappas, etc.)
                        Thanks!
